I'm Marichu Quinsona from North Caloocan based in Philippines. My work is inspired by anime. I love to create a sketch of a person, anime characters, places where I can put my imagination into a reality. I am focused on working creating a colorful work and chasing my imaginations. I am working as a Data Analysts from a known Tech-Company here at the Philippines.
To feel more relax I used to play guitar, sketch, play with my dog, and drink coffee.
